dmca.title: CNN  complains of blogged copies
dmca.body:
CNNMoney.com article - Violation of Cable News Network LP, LLLP Rights in the 
CNNMoney.com article "Yahoo vs. Google, round two" written by Adam Lashinsky 
posted at http://nick79O3O.blogspot.corn/2006/Q8/yahoo-vs.html. 

Dear Agent: 

I, the undersigned, CERTIFY UNDER PENALTY OF PERJURY that I am an agent 
authorized to act on behalf of the exclusive licensee in the United States and its possessions ("Territory") of certain intellectual property rights, said licensee being named Cable News Network LP, LLLP ("IP Owner"). I have a good faith belief that the materials identified in the addendum attached hereto are not authorized by the above IP Owner, its agent or the law and therefore infringe the IP Owner's rights according to state and/or federal law. Please act expeditiously to remove or disable access to the material or 
items claimed to be infringing. 

My contact information is as follows: 
Printed Name: [private]
Title & Company: Administrator, Rights and Litigation, Cable News Network LP, LLLP 
Address: One CNN Center 
City and State: Atlanta, Georgia 
Zip: 30303 
Email (correspondence): [private]@turner.com 
Telephone: [private]
Fax: [private]

Truthfully, 
[signed]

[private]
Administrator, Rights and Litigation 
Telephone: [private]
Fax: [private]
[private]
Addendum to Notice of Infringement: 
List of Allegedly Infringing Materials

Name of Exclusive Licensee/IP Owner: 
Cable News Network LP, LLLP

Infringed Work or Right: "Yahoo vs. Google, round two" from CNNMoney.com - posted by Nick H. and located at http://nick79O3O8.b1ogspot.com/2OC6/O6/yahoo-vs.html.
Please see the attached documents for additional information.
